mapper.update: update picture set flag=#{flag} where id=#{id}
update picture set share=#{share} where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from picture where uid=#{uid} and cover=1
delete from picture where uid=#{uid} and flag=0
delete from picture where uid=#{uid} and cover=1 and flag=1
mapper.select: select * from picture where cover=0 and uid=#{uid}
select * from picture where cover=1 and flag=1 and uid=#{uid} order by time desc limit 0,1;
select * from picture where flag=0 and cover=0 and uid=#{uid}
select * from picture where flag=0 and uid=#{uid}
select * from picture where flag=0 and uid=#{uid}

SELECT tablea.uid uid, tablea.num num, tablea.mid mid, tablea.name name, tablea.sex sex, tablea.provname provname, tablea.seat_provname seat_provname, p.id pid from( select u.id uid, u.name num, m.id mid, m.name name, m.sex sex, m.provname provname, m.seat_provname seat_provname from `user` u,v_reconfiguration_relay_member m WHERE u.id = m.uid and m.flag=1 ) tablea LEFT JOIN picture p ON tablea.uid=p.uid and cover=1 and flag=1 Order by num

SELECT tablea.uid uid, tablea.num num, tablea.mid mid, tablea.name name, tablea.sex sex, tablea.provname provname, tablea.seat_provname seat_provname, p.id pid from( select u.id uid, u.name num, m.id mid, m.name name, m.sex sex, m.provname provname, m.seat_provname seat_provname from `user` u,v_reconfiguration_relay_member m WHERE u.id = m.uid and m.flag=1 and m.school=#{school} ) tablea LEFT JOIN picture p ON tablea.uid=p.uid and cover=1 and flag=1 Order by num

SELECT tablea.uid uid, tablea.num num, tablea.mid mid, tablea.name name, tablea.sex sex, tablea.provname provname, tablea.seat_provname seat_provname, p.id pid from( select u.id uid, u.name num, m.id mid, m.name name, m.sex sex, m.provname provname, m.seat_provname seat_provname from `user` u,v_reconfiguration_relay_member m WHERE u.id = m.uid and m.flag=1 ) tablea LEFT JOIN picture p ON tablea.uid=p.uid and cover=1 and flag=0 Order by num
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM picture where cover=1 and uid=#{uid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM picture where cover=0 and uid=#{uid}

select p.id id, p.flag flag, u.id uid, u.name name, m.id mid, m.name realName, m.sex sex from user u,member m,picture p where p.flag=0 and u.id=p.uid and u.id=m.uid group by uid
